original_title: Absolute Gold: Taken Down Under: Falcon Four Hours
overview: Absolute Gold: Taken Down Under features smoldering scenes played out in the land down-under. On the beach, in the bar, aboard ship and deep in the outback these guys get down and dirty amid some of the most spectacular scenery to be found on any continent. Sit back, settle in and enjoy the exploits of all your mates down under!
title: Absolute Gold: Taken Down Under: Falcon Four Hours
